channel.title: I need a new computer
channel.description:
Well, I turned 16 etc. I need a computer. I'm more interested in a laptop as I don't really PC game anymore. My old laptop was a everex stepnote which was complete shit. So I'd love to get some advice on the new computer before I buy it.
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16834147934
I'm looking for speed and battery life..

item.title: I need a new computer
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:7, topic:287442”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=380073.msg2859235#msg2859235 date=1247067710]

Photoshop
Dreamweaver
Sony Vegas

The first two require very little processing power.

multiple programs like that running at same time.

You’re look for DDR3 RAM.
[/quote]
wut, i have slow ddr2 and i could run those seemlessly[/quote]
I understand that; but, he was thinking along the lines of processing power, I was trying to say good quality RAM is what he’s after.

Most laptops come with DDR2 @ <= 667MHz.

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote]

They tend to go against each other somewhat, what do you need speed for if your not going to game on it?[/quote]I like things like video editing so…

Dreamweaver
Sony Vegas

multiple programs like that running at same time.

item.title: I need a new computer
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

Just whatever you get, put XP or linux on it. There are like no advantages vista has over anything, it just slows everything down.
